Name: IIS WebSite - Stop
Description: Stops a web site in IIS.

Properties.Octopus.Action.Script.ScriptBody:
# Load IIS module:
Import-Module WebAdministration

# Set a name of the site we want to stop
$siteName = $OctopusParameters['webSiteName']

# Get web site object
$webSite = Get-Item "IIS:\Sites\$webSiteName"

Write-Output "Stopping IIS web site $webSiteName"
$webSite.Stop()

Parameters.Name: webSiteName
Parameters.Label: web Site Name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the site in IIS
